game.name: Block Avalanche
game.description:
If you are an adventure freak, you must play this brand new platform game in your device right away - be it a desktop, a mobile phone or a gaming console. Join Block Avalanche game and get ready to apply all your intensive adventurous skills to make a win in the end! In this free online adventure game, you will have to avoid all of the blocks falling upon you. Although it sounds a little bit difficult to achieve the goal in the beginning, playing it several times helps you get expertise and win easily. 

It will be in your hands now to assist your character to survive as long as possible in this highly addictive and fast-paced skill game. Try to prevent the falling blocks hit you otherwise you will lose the game. Make sure to make a proper distance from the rising lava. Play hard and keep collecting as many diamonds as you can to get a high score. You can use the tap controls or arrow keys to move your character in this cool HTML5 game for boys and girls. 

The protagonist of the game trusts on your talents a lot. So, play with full confidence while outrunning the snow that is falling upon you at high speed. Keep your eyes on the sky continuously to avoid the heavy blocks timely and save the life of your character! The more you play, the bigger you addict you will become of this classic avalanche style game. Feel free to check out our top games page to find more interesting and engaging games during your free time!
